qas.question: When were images of new iPod colors leaked?

context: In <a0_0>mid-2015<a0_0/>, several new color schemes for all of the current iPod models were spotted in the latest version of iTunes, <a2_0><a3_0>12.2<a3_0/><a2_0/>.
